channel.title: Royal-Scape - Bossing l Great staff l Smooth Pking l & Nice eco!
channel.description:
Hello, we'd like to welcome you, to a server that is still undergoing devolopment. We have been at constint work since our last server has shut down. But we've moved to bigger and better things. Ko Raw & I (Str Pker) have a server together. He has is doing updates daily, on how the server can be better and what we can do to fix it for you guys.
Some features we have: -Fully working god wars *You get to pick what boss you'd like to go to after so many kills (SHown in image) -Custom mini game *Its a pking mini game you enter with no items, and go in with full bandos, dfs, ags, food ect.. *Move onto different ranks as you kill so many people *Rewards are incredible and are automatic! (You'll see what i mean) -We are trying to make pk smoother *AS in, that their is no lag when you first hit each other *And that armor is effective, and players can actually hit -We have full working prayers -Hot keys! -A gambling machine *Max bet is only 500k -We added these items in also *Torva *Virtus *Pernix ALong with *Vesta *Statius -Spirit shields have been added -Along with chaotics
[size=18pt][size=12pt]-HIGHSCORES WILL BE ADDED- FULLY WORKING! ALONG WITH VOTE4CASH LATER ON IN THE WEEK![/size][/size]
Here are some images of the server.
Home area [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/6paq6a.png[/img]
Shops are spread All around [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/qod0ya.png[/img]
Some teleport options [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/kcatrd.png[/img] [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/2hnb77b.png[/img] [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/vx0kgl.png[/img]
God wars! [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/2lswbi0.png[/img]
The custom mini game [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/2ivhe7q.png[/img] [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/cq74p.png[/img]
Fully working following for range and mage in pk: [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/2i76d6x.png[/img]
Duel arena fully working! [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/2qwinv5.png[/img]
Spoils! [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/289wqok.png[/img]
Jad is one wave: [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/33y10jp.png[/img]
Highscors! : [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/2mzxrx2.png[/img]
I will be updating this thread daily. We dont have a downloadable client at the moment, we have a webclient. Feel free to join the forums!
http://royalscapez.ucoz.com/ New downloadable client : http://www.mediafire.com/download/qf6nbc56ayzx0ff/Royal-Scapez_Client.zip

item.title: Royal-Scape - Bossing l Great staff l Smooth Pking l & Nice eco!
item.dc:creator: @Str_Pker_CODER Str Pker CODER
item.description:
@Str_Pker_CODER wrote:

Hello, we’d like to welcome you, to a server that is still undergoing devolopment. We have been at constint work since our last server has shut down. But we’ve moved to bigger and better things. Ko Raw & I (Str Pker) have a server together. He has is doing updates daily, on how the server can be better and what we can do to fix it for you guys.

Some features we have:
-Fully working god wars
*You get to pick what boss you’d like to go to after so many kills (SHown in image)
-Custom mini game
*Its a pking mini game you enter with no items, and go in with full bandos, dfs, ags, food ect…
*Move onto different ranks as you kill so many people
*Rewards are incredible and are automatic! (You’ll see what i mean)
-We are trying to make pk smoother
*AS in, that their is no lag when you first hit each other
*And that armor is effective, and players can actually hit
-We have full working prayers
-Hot keys!
-A gambling machine
*Max bet is only 500k
-We added these items in also
*Torva
*Virtus
*Pernix
ALong with
*Vesta
*Statius
-Spirit shields have been added
-Along with chaotics

[size=18pt][size=12pt]-HIGHSCORES WILL BE ADDED- FULLY WORKING! ALONG WITH VOTE4CASH LATER ON IN THE WEEK![/size][/size]

Here are some images of the server.

I will be updating this thread daily. We dont have a downloadable client at the moment, we have a webclient.
Feel free to join the forums!
